metadata.title: CVE-2021-29063 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDOS) vulnerability was discoveredin Mpmath v1.0.0 through v1.2.1 when the mpmathify function is called.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-29063` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-mpmath - 0.19-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
python3-mpmath - 0.19-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mpmath package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.19-3ubuntu0.1~esm1').
